mapper.select: select id, file_name, attachment_name, attachment_path, `type`, opr_id, update_time, insert_time from file_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into file_record (id, file_name, attachment_name, attachment_path, `type`, opr_id, update_time, insert_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{oprId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
